issue.title: tutorial on how to create a new model and contribute through gazebo_models repo or thepropshop.org

content.raw:
[This](http://www.gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=model_contrib&cat=build_robot) tutorial has some instructions on how to contribute to the model database.

That tutorial seems to be misleading a lot of people though. I'd say that most of the [declined](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_models/pull-requests/?state=DECLINED) pull requests to `gazebo_models` were a consequence of that tutorial being misinterpreted. Not sure how, but we could try to improve it.
content.html:
This tutorial has some instructions on how to contribute to the model database.

That tutorial seems to be misleading a lot of people though. I'd say that most of the declined pull requests to gazebo_models were a consequence of that tutorial being misinterpreted. Not sure how, but we could try to improve it.
